story_teamgalactic_01_07000/2401_1201_01:
So people are seeing mysterious nightmares.
Thanks for letting me know.
story_teamgalactic_01_07000/2401_1201_02: I think I might know what’s causing that.
story_teamgalactic_01_07000/2401_1201_03:
Something like this happened before in
Canalave City.
story_teamgalactic_01_07000/2401_1201_04:
Professor Rowan told me about a Mythical
Pokémon called Darkrai that lives in the
Sinnoh region.
story_teamgalactic_01_07000/2401_1201_05:
Apparently, it can make people and Pokémon
experience horrific nightmares.
story_teamgalactic_01_07000/2401_1201_06:
Team Galactic might be using Darkrai to make
everyone have those nightmares!
story_teamgalactic_01_07000/2401_1201_07:
Which means Team Galactic is misusing this
Pokémon and its power?
story_teamgalactic_01_07000/2401_1201_08: What an awful thing to do!
story_teamgalactic_01_07000/2401_1201_09:
I know. We have to stop them before they do
even more damage!
story_teamgalactic_01_07000/2401_1201_10:
Agreed. We can’t let them abuse Pokémon
like that.
story_teamgalactic_01_07000/2401_1201_13:
I still believe Cyrus can change his ways here
on Pasio.
story_teamgalactic_01_07000/2401_1201_14:
If we want to stop Team Galactic, brute force
won’t cut it. We have to change their mindset
and ideas.
story_teamgalactic_01_07000/2401_1201_16:
Understood! That’s probably the best course of
action, if we can do it.
story_teamgalactic_01_07000/2401_1201_18:
Hey, everyone! I just received more intel from the
International Police!
story_teamgalactic_01_07000/2401_1201_20: And I hear Barry is also on his way there, too!
story_teamgalactic_01_07000/2401_1201_21: I see. Then I suppose it’s time for a showdown.
story_teamgalactic_01_07000/2401_1201_22: Yeah! Let’s go and stop Team Galactic!
